title: De dødes tjern
description: A group of friends travel to a cabin in the Norwegian forest. It's a rumor that at night a crazy man can be heard screaming at a lake nearby the cabin.

title: Knutsen & Ludvigsen
description: Knutsen and Ludvigsen has all against the law chosen to live inside a tunnel.

title: Sweetwater
description: After a ruining war in a grim anarchist future civilization, Allan and his family decide to move out of the city and settle at a big garbage dump to survive on the waste. But there is a great shortage of water. It's a struggle to exist.

title: Den forsvundne pølsemaker
description: The detectives Gløgg and Rask is put on the task of finding out what has happened to the lost sausage maker H. Brand. They find him after a lot of trouble.

title: Bryllupsfesten
description: Businessman Totto is on the verge of bankruptcy. Under cover of his daughters wedding, he plans on saving the family fortune by an advanced insurance scam. Burglars are to steal copies of valuable Munch-paintings. But which are the copies?

title: Reisen til julestjernen
description: A small princess in a small kingdom in Adventureland disappears on Christmas eve. She has gone out to find the Christmas Star. The Queen follows and the King curses the Christmas Star, so it disappears for years, until young Sonja arrives.

title: Vi gifter oss
description: Petter and Kari meet, fall in love, and get married. But it is not easy for a young couple of limited means to find a place to live. Moving in with Petter's parents proves impossible, Kari can't endure her mother-in-law's constant interference. Trying to build a house of their own is halted by so much red tape, and affordable rentals is hard to come by. When Kari gets pregnant things doesn't get any easier.

title: Den brysomme mannen
description: In a strange city where every person seems content beyond reason a new man arrives in town and stirs up trouble by asking too many questions.

title: Fjols til fjells
description: At a high mountain hotel in Norway the porter Poppe tries to do the best he can for the guests with an often unhelpful piccolo Rudolf. This, however, leads to a lot of problems, and Poppe thinks some of the guests behave inappropriate.

title: Insomnia
description: In a Norwegian city with a 24-hour daylight cycle a Swedish murder investigator has been brought in on a special case. Sleep deprived, he makes a horrible mistake which is discovered by the killer he has been hunting.

title: Ung flukt
description: The story of young Gerd, played by Liv Ullmann in her first leading role, who falls in love with a young boy. She is considered a 'loose' woman, and the boy's family does not accept their relationship. The young couple run away to a cabin in the woods where they meet a rogue man who tests their relationship.

title: Bør Børson Jr.
description: This is the story about the great man of Olderdalen which starts as a simple shop-owner in the country and ends up as a tycoon in the capital.

title: Adjø Solidaritet
description: A harrowing and ironic story about the first big and well educated generation born after WW2, living without any major concerns between 1965 and 1975. We follow shrink and doctor Atle and his good theater working friend Eigil.

title: To mistenkelige personer
description: Two police officers lie dead. Ekstrøm and the youngster Gustav are on their flight. Originally a 1926 story, this film was banned for more than 50 years, due to a high court order banning the film for the sake of human privacy.

title: Bobbys krig
description: Robert and his son Bobby are having a difficult time in Oslo, Norway during WW2. Robert is trying to take care of his son, but he is struggling with his addiction to alcohol, women, and scams. Bobby befriends a German soldier, who is teaching him fencing, but Bobby's connection to his father is mixed up between idolizing and observing his many mistakes.

title: Over grensen
description: Jacob and Rachel were killed on their flight to Sweden in 1942, and a year later their bodies are discovered. After the war the case is again opened, and the guilty are hunted.

title: Bør Børson II
description: In Olderdalen Bør Børson has affirmed his stand as the king of the valley and the richest man with the biggest house.

title: Kalde spor
description: Wartime 1944. Oddmund stays at a remote cabin in the high mountains, about to lead 12 refugees out of the country. But he also awaits the most important person is his life, Ragnhild, which isn't coming.

title: Arven
description: Gathered at a funeral for a successful business man, the testament is to be read. They will all inherit, with a big IF; if the family company is to be joint run by all the heirs.

title: Kjærlighetens kjøtere
description: A young writer whose proposal was recently rejected goes to Greenland to spend a year at an outpost for hunting and trapping animals for furs. At the outpost he meets two men who are none too keen to spend the winter with the newcomer.

title: Op med hodet!
description: The stuttering Theobald stumbles on some ballet girls in town with a theater on tour, and falls in love with Lill. This leads to an interest in becoming an actor, and a theater boss see him as an unintended comic relief on stage.

title: Heksene fra den forstenede skog
description: The stuttering Theobald stumbles on some ballet girls in town with a theater on tour, and falls in love with Lill. This leads to an interest in becoming an actor, and a theater boss see him as an unintended comic relief on stage.

title: Balladen om mestertyven Ole Høiland
englishtitle: Ballad of the Masterthief Ole Hoiland
description: The legend of the master thief Ole Høiland who i the first half of the 1800s stole from the rich and charmed the women he met on his way, until he tried to make a heist from the National bank.

title: Fedrelandet
description: Being connected to nature, what does it mean? Father knows and father shows. The director's father is 84. We follow in his footsteps into the mountain home. Into nature's smallest life and out to grand panoramas, where he grew up.

title: Uno
description: David is a twenty-five-year-old with few prospects for the future and spends his days with petty criminals at an inner-city gym. When the police find drugs at the gym, David makes a drastic decision in order to see his dying father.

title: Gategutter
description: The movie takes place on Oslo's east side sometime during the twenties. It depicts the workers' environment by traditional elements like unemployment, strike, poverty, alcoholism, absent fathers, wise and tired mothers, the dream of a better life and the friendship between the boys in the street.

title: At dere tør!
description: Two 16 year old petty criminals steals a car and are followed by the police in a dramatic car chase, and when they boys are about to run off by foot, one is shot by the police. This changes the other boy's life.

title: Fant
description: An orphan, Josefa, runs away from her threatening uncle with whom she is living, and stows away on traveller Fændrik's boat. She is no better off with him, however, as he forces himself on her and makes her steal and beg for a living. Meanwhile Fændrik's sister, who has been left penniless on shore by her deceitful brother, joins forces with Josefa's fiancé, Oscar, in a search for the missing pair.

title: Åpen framtid
description: A 16 year old boy growing up in the '60s, trying to go his own ways. He is inseparable from his friends and starts dropping school and starts experimenting with life, sex, drugs, alcohol.

title: Hustruer
description: Three women decides to go on a male-like ramp for a week instead of cooking dinner for their husbands for the sake of female liberation.

title: An-Magritt
description: A historical drama following the struggles of a young woman in 17th-century Norway.

title: Is-slottet
description: A haunting tale of friendship between two girls and the secrets surrounding a frozen waterfall.

title: Ung frue forsvunnet
description: A suspenseful story of a missing woman and the investigation that follows.

title: Sølvmunn
description: A gritty drama exploring the complexities of rural Norwegian life.

title: Secondløitnanten
description: The inspiring tale of a retired officer who takes command during Norway's World War II occupation.

title: Den siste Fleksnes
description: A humorous continuation of the beloved Norwegian Fleksnes TV series.

title: Kimen
description: On a small green island out in the sea, they live in harmony - until a stranger comes. Like a hurricane this rocks the small society, and a killing lets all hidden forces loose.

title: Ungen
description: A poignant drama capturing the struggles of working-class life in 1930s Norway.

title: Kasserer Jensen
description: A lighthearted comedy about the quirky life of a Norwegian cashier.

title: Nattseilere
description: A gripping drama about a family navigating challenges in a remote coastal village.

title: Gymnaslærer Pedersen
description: A schoolteacher reflects on his time as a revolutionary in the 1970s Norwegian political movement.

title: Exit
description: A thought-provoking drama exploring existential themes and personal liberation.

title: Gylne ungdom
description: A drama highlighting the challenges and privileges of growing up in an affluent Norwegian society.

title: Maria Marusjka
description: A poignant film exploring the life and struggles of a young woman in a rapidly changing world.

title: Papirfuglen
description: A drama about the delicate balance of relationships and the fragility of human connections.

title: Dagny
description: A biographical drama about the life and love of Dagny Juel, a Norwegian writer and cultural icon.

title: Bussen
description: A charming comedy about the misadventures of a small-town bus driver and his passengers.

title: Deilig er fjorden!
description: A comedic tale set in the picturesque Norwegian fjords, exploring local traditions and quirky characters.

title: Døden på Oslo S
description: A gritty crime drama that delves into the lives of troubled youth at Oslo Central Station.

title: Gritt
description: A moving portrayal of a woman seeking to navigate the complexities of art, community, and identity.

title: Gjest Baardsen
description: A historical adventure film about the life of the famous Norwegian outlaw, Gjest Baardsen.

title: Mors hus
description: A haunting drama about family secrets and the struggles of self-discovery.

title: Stompa & Co.
description: A light-hearted comedy following the adventures of Stompa and his mischievous friends at boarding school.

title: Drømmeslottet
description: A gripping tale of ambition and disillusionment set against the backdrop of a dreamlike castle.

title: Ungen
description: A touching story about love and resilience in a working-class Norwegian community.

title: Lars i porten
description: A poignant drama exploring the life of a troubled youth in a small Norwegian town.

title: Reisen til Melonia
description: An animated adaptation of Shakespeare’s 'The Tempest', set in a fantastical world.

title: Skulle det dukke opp flere lik, er det bare å ringe
englishtitle: If More Corpses Turn Up, Just Give Me a Call
description: A comedic murder mystery filled with eccentric characters and twists.

title: Telegrafisten
description: A heartfelt tale of love and ambition set in a remote Norwegian coastal town.

title: Ellos eatnu – La elva leve
description: A powerful historical drama inspired by the Alta River demonstrations in Norway during the 1970s.

title: Armand
description: A poignant and intimate exploration of human relationships and emotional complexities.

title: Piratene
description: Ronny and Jørgen live in a Norwegian town called Svolvær (Lofoten, Norway). They come up with the brilliant idea, starting up an illegal radio-channel called Radio Feskslog.

title: Kristin Lavransdatter
description: Kristin, the daughter of a prominent landowner in medieval Norway, grows up embracing family loyalty, social pride, and devout Christianity. Betrothed to another landowner's son, her life takes a dramatic turn when she falls for the knight Erlend Nikulausson, a forbidden love that sparks envy, scandal, and danger. Betrayal, revenge, and social turmoil follow as Kristin becomes the center of a public scandal. Ultimately, after much strife, the lovers unite, but their happiness is marred by the consequences of their tumultuous journey.
